text: pumiyil pala tokutikalai cerntarpol amaittu (atil) tiratcai, taniyappayir nilankalaiyum, periccantoppukalaiyum akkinan; kilaikal ullatum, kilaikal illatatumana marankalaiyum (urpatti ceykiran. Ivai anaittirkum) orevita nir pukattappattapotilum, cilavarraivita cilavarrai cuvaiyil nam menmaiyakki vaittom. Itil, arivutaiya makkalukku niccayamaka pala attatcikal irukkinrana
